author: mpetrunic
content: Did anyone implement validator using this API: https://app.swaggerhub.com/apis/spble/beacon_node_api_for_validator/0.2.0#/MinimalSet/post_validator_attestation

content: I was looking trough implementations and if I understand correctly, most of you receives AttestationData from beacon node and send back Attestation object

author: mpetrunic
content: I'm triying to implement using this API but not really sure how to convert received IndexedAttestation to Attestation in beacon node
